HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Added mod menu (under Rimtroid: Core) | Update: Metroid Queen is now usable, which leads the local Metroid faction. | Queen can be assigned metroids that it will store, release, and recall. | New Ability: Fireballs (Omega Metroid). | Mod Menu: Berserking can now be toggled. | Mod Menu: All metroids can now be tamed. | Mod Menu: Squad raids can be enabled/disabled. | Numerous ability graphics added. | Various bug fixes.
